name: openshift-cartridge-nodejs
description: Custom Node.js cartridge for OpenShift - sample application

scripts.start: PORT=$OPENSHIFT_NODEJS_PORT BIND_ADDRESS=$OPENSHIFT_NODEJS_IP HEROKU_URL=$OPENSHIFT_APP_DNS REDIS_URL=redis://:$REDIS_PASSWORD@$OPENSHIFT_REDIS_HOST:$OPENSHIFT_REDIS_PORT bin/hubot -n Hubot -a slack
scripts.pm2start: PORT=$OPENSHIFT_NODEJS_PORT BIND_ADDRESS=$OPENSHIFT_NODEJS_IP HEROKU_URL=$OPENSHIFT_APP_DNS REDIS_URL=redis://:$REDIS_PASSWORD@$OPENSHIFT_REDIS_HOST:$OPENSHIFT_REDIS_PORT pm2 start --name hubot --interpreter sh bin/hubot -- -n Hubot -a slack

author: Ionut-Cristian Florescu <ionut.florescu@gmail.com>
